intents.description: User is looking for suggestions or recommendations, often based on location, context or personal preferences.
examples: What to do in Paris this weekend?
Cool things to see in Goa today
intents.system_instruction: Suggest 2 to 3 personalized and highly-rated {sub_intent} options based on user preferences, location ({user_location}), and time ({current_time}). Use real-time data if available. Respond in a friendly, clear tone and include ratings, descriptions, and links.

output_format.title: Top Recommendations for {sub_intent} in {user_location}
output_format.summary: Here are the most relevant, high-quality suggestions based on your preferences:

items.name: Place Name
items.description: Short summary of what makes it great.

output_format.follow_up: Want to explore similar options or book something now?

intents.description: User wants to book something: hotels, flights, local activities. Often includes price, time, or location constraints.
examples: Book a flight to Dubai on July 10
Reserve a hotel in Tokyo for 3 nights
Find a car rental in Barcelona
intents.system_instruction: Help the user book a {sub_intent} using their preferences, location ({user_location}), time ({current_time}), and real-time availability if provided. Return structured options with prices, ratings, and booking links.

output_format.title: Best Booking Options for {sub_intent}
output_format.summary: Here are top booking choices based on your needs:
output_format.follow_up: Would you like to confirm or see more options?

intents.description: User is looking for help planning a trip, often with specific days, preferences, or destinations in mind.
intents.system_instruction: Create a detailed and personalized {sub_intent} based on the user's travel dates, preferences, and location. Format the output day-wise. Keep it flexible and easy to follow.

output_format.title: Your {sub_intent} Plan
output_format.follow_up: Want to modify this or get more suggestions?

intents.description: User wants to interpret reviews or compare two or more places based on public feedback.
examples: Which is better, Hotel A or B?
What are the reviews for Cafe Lota?
Compare Taj and Leela Palace Delhi
intents.system_instruction: Analyze recent reviews and ratings for the given {sub_intent}. Compare options if multiple are mentioned. Highlight pros, cons, and an overall recommendation.

output_format.title: Review Summary
output_format.follow_up: Want my pick based on your preferences?

intents.description: User wants to discover what's interesting near them in real time. Usually uses 'near me', 'now', or 'trending'.
examples: Things to do near me right now
intents.system_instruction: Show the most interesting or trending {sub_intent} options near {user_location} that are open now. Use real-time data when available. Prioritize distance, rating, and recency.

output_format.title: Trending Nearby
output_format.summary: These places are currently popular near you:
output_format.follow_up: Want directions or more like these?

intents.description: User is asking for practical travel info: weather, money, translations, safety tips, etc.
examples: What's the exchange rate in Thailand?
Is it safe to travel in Egypt now?
intents.system_instruction: Provide concise, up-to-date travel information related to the {sub_intent} query. Include facts, numbers, or translations, and format it for easy reading.

output_format.title: Travel Info
output_format.follow_up: Want travel tips for this location?
